_header: Children been little bright and sheen and eath for to fillen
_description: Characteristics of children — one couplet translating ‘Sicut pueri parui, puri, paruo saciati / Ludunt conformes, cito dant, cito pacificantur’, which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Children ben litel brith & schene & eþe for to
                    fillenSuetliche pleyȝende fre of ȝifte & eþe for to
                    stillen
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 11.
